channel.title: Sleepwalker Source?
channel.description: Does anyone have the original sleepwalker source. I would post this in the CC considering those in there would be old enough to actually know what I am talking about but that forum is dead.

item.title: Sleepwalker Source?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

http://www.geocities.ws/Rune_Plate_Pure/Bots.html

http://www.geocities.ws/Rune_Plate_Pure/Coldfeet7.0.2.zip

Who would have thought a geocities website would provide the most complete archive of RS cheating left on the internet… Unreal. I don’t see any source code there so I guess we’re shit out of luck unless theres a way around it (plz don’t call me an idiot lol :s)

Read full topic

item.title: Sleepwalker Source?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Couldn’t find sleepwalker but I was able to track down LeoSleep which did essentially the same thing. I’m not sure if you can somehow extract the code from an executable so hopefully you can figure that out.

PS: Here’s the thread I found it in – https://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=60127 I wanted to upload it here in case villavu ever disappears or the attachments go bad. If you wanted to keep looking for SleepWalker I would just keep combing the villavu boards as they are really the only real RS cheating board (aside from us) from that time that is still active.

Also I would scan the RAR just for safety sake.

EDIT: can’t post it as an attachment…

http://www.filedropper.com/img_10

http://www.filedropper.com/leosleep

MITB if you see this could you drop the leosleep RAR onto your server somewhere public. IE mscp.org/leosleep

Read full topic
